main event: A round, metallic object was observed floating in the water off the coast of Taichung, Taiwan on 11 March 1958.
interesting points: The object was loaned to the USAF for identification., It was identified as an unidentified object by radar at Taichung, Taiwan., A photograph and a descriptive drawing of the object exist., The object is believed to potentially relate to some kind of valve., There have been several similar reports of maritime incidents that resulted in no substantive action.
